/* PEDMWEB0002.selectProdOrdListTotCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT A.PROD_CD ,A.SRCMK_CD ,A.PROD_NM ,A.PROD_STD ,A.ORD_IPSU ,A.ORD_UNIT ,B.PROD_CD AS B_PROD_CD FROM TED_ORD_SUPP_INFO_NEXTDAY A INNER JOIN STORE@dl_md_martnis ST ON A.STR_CD = ST.STR_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TED_PO_ORD_PROD B ON A.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND A.ORD_DY = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND A.VEN_CD = B.VEN_CD AND A.ORD_DY = B.ORD_DY AND A.PROD_CD = B.PROD_CD WHERE A.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND A.ORD_DY = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1, 'YYYYMMDD')
A.STR_CD = #strCd#
ST.AREA_FG = #areaCd#
A.PROD_CD like #prodCd#||'%'
A.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#prodNm#||'%'
B.PROD_CD IS NOT NULL
B.PROD_CD IS NULL
GROUP BY A.PROD_CD ,A.SRCMK_CD ,A.PROD_NM ,A.PROD_STD ,A.ORD_IPSU ,A.ORD_UNIT ,B.PROD_CD )

/* PEDMWEB0002.selectProdOrdList */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM ( SELECT A.PROD_CD ,A.ORD_DY ,A.SRCMK_CD ,A.PROD_NM ,A.PROD_STD ,A.ORD_IPSU ,A.ORD_UNIT ,B.PROD_CD AS B_PROD_CD FROM TED_ORD_SUPP_INFO_NEXTDAY A INNER JOIN STORE@dl_md_martnis ST ON A.STR_CD = ST.STR_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TED_PO_ORD_PROD B ON B.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND B.ORD_DY =TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND A.PROD_CD = B.PROD_CD AND A.VEN_CD = B.VEN_CD AND A.ORD_DY = B.ORD_DY
WHERE A.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND A.ORD_DY = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1, 'YYYYMMDD')
ST.AREA_FG = #areaCd#
A.PROD_CD like #prodCd#||'%'
A.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#prodNm#||'%'
A.STR_CD = #strCd#
B.PROD_CD IS NOT NULL
B.PROD_CD IS NULL
GROUP BY A.PROD_CD ,A.ORD_DY ,A.SRCMK_CD ,A.PROD_NM ,A.PROD_STD ,A.ORD_IPSU ,A.ORD_UNIT ,B.PROD_CD ORDER BY A.PROD_CD ) A )A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #startRowNo# AND #endRowNo#

/* PEDMWEB0002.selectProdOrdDetInfo */ SELECT M1.PROD_CD ,M1.STR_CD ,M1.ORD_DY ,M1.VEN_NM ,S1.STR_NM ,M1.ORD_IPSU ,M1.ORD_UNIT ,M1.ORD_BUY_PRC ,M2.ORD_QTY ,M2.ORD_REQ_NO FROM TED_ORD_SUPP_INFO_NEXTDAY M1 INNER JOIN STORE@dl_md_martnis S1 ON M1.STR_CD = S1.STR_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TED_PO_ORD_PROD M2 ON M2.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND M2.ORD_DY = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND M2.PROD_CD = #prodCd# AND M1.STR_CD = M2.STR_CD AND M1.PROD_CD = M2.PROD_CD AND M1.ORD_DY = M2.ORD_DY AND M1.VEN_CD = M2.VEN_CD
WHERE M1.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND M1.ORD_DY = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND M1.PROD_CD = #prodCd#
S1.AREA_FG = #areaCd#
M1.STR_CD = #strCd#
ORDER BY S1.AREA_FG, S1.SORT_ORDER

/* PEDMWEB0002.selectProdCntSum */ SELECT SUM(ORD_QTY) AS ORD_TOT_QTY_SUM ,SUM(ORD_QTY*ORD_IPSU) AS ORD_TOT_ALL_QTY_SUM ,SUM(ORD_QTY*ORD_IPSU*ORD_BUY_PRC) AS ORD_TOT_PRC_SUM FROM TED_PO_ORD_PROD T1 WHERE T1.VEN_CD = #venCd# AND T1.ORD_DY = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1,'YYYYMMDD') AND T1.PROD_CD = #prodCd#
